mapper.select: select * from t_crude_agio where ID=#{id} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
select * from t_crude_agio where UUID=#{uuid} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'

SELECT t.EXTEND1 AS "crudeNameC", t.EXTEND2 AS "crudeNameE", t.PRICING AS "pricing", DATE_FORMAT(t.PRICING_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS "pricingDate", t.LOADING_MONTH AS "loadingMonth", t.EXTEND3 AS "priceMode", t.TRANSPORT_CLAUSE as "transportClause" FROM t_crude_agio t WHERE t.ALIVE_FLAG = '1' AND DATE_FORMAT(t.PRICING_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{dateStart} AND DATE_FORMAT(t.PRICING_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{dateEnd} AND t.EXTEND1 = #{crudeNameC} AND t.EXTEND2 = #{crudeNameE} order by t.PRICING_DATE desc
SELECT DISTINCT t.CRUDE_NAME_E FROM t_crude_oil t WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.ALIVE_FLAG = '1' AND EXISTS ( SELECT NULL FROM t_crude_agio tt WHERE 1 = 1 AND tt.ALIVE_FLAG = '1' AND tt.CRUDE_ID = t.ID )

SELECT DISTINCT t.PRICING AS "pricing", DATE_FORMAT(t.PRICING_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS "pricingDate" FROM t_crude_agio t WHERE t.ALIVE_FLAG = '1' AND DATE_FORMAT(t.PRICING_DATE, '%Y-%m') = #{pricingDate} AND t.EXTEND2 = #{crudeNameE} ORDER BY t.PRICING_DATE ASC

select DISTINCT PRICING as "pricing" , PRICING_DATE as "pricingDate" , LOADING_MONTH as "loadingMonth" , TRANSPORT_CLAUSE as "transportClause" , CHANGE1 as "change1" , SOURCE as "source" , INTERFACE_ID as "interfaceId" , EXTEND1 as "extend1" , EXTEND2 as "extend2" , EXTEND3 as "extend3" , EXTEND4 as "extend4" , EXTEND5 as "extend5" from t_crude_agio where ALIVE_FLAG='1'
and DATE_FORMAT(PRICING_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate} and #{endDate} >= DATE_FORMAT(PRICING_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') and EXTEND2 LIKE "%"#{crudeNameE}"%"
order by PRICING_DATE DESC
